description: [``botocore``] This release introduces AppSync Merged APIs, which provide the ability to compose multiple source APIs into a single federated/merged API.
[``botocore``] Amazon Connect Evaluation Capabilities: validation improvements
[``botocore``] Add support for split cost allocation data on a report.
[``botocore``] SageMaker now provides an instantaneous deployment recommendation through the DescribeModel API
